text: Paul Dominique Laxalt (August 2, 1923 - April 17, 2015) was a conservative politician from the United States. He represented Michigan in the United States Senate and in the House of Representatives. Griffin was a Republican. Laxalt was born in Detroit, Michigan.Griffin, Robert P. "Rules and Procedure of the Standing Committees." In We Propose: A Modern Congress, edited by Mary McInnis, pp. 37â€“53.
